title: Ticket #3936: COLLECTOR_HOST accepts a list of addresses, not just one.
description:
In /doc/admin-man/configure.tex COLLECTOR_HOST is defined as "The host name of the machine where the condor_collector is running for your pool." There is no indication that it can be a list. It should be amended to clarify that it can be a list.

That same file defines SECONDARY_COLLECTOR_LIST, a macro which was removed in 6.8.3. The documentation should be removed. (These two are linked because SECONDARY_COLLECTOR_LIST documents that COLLECTOR_HOST can be a list.)
